hey,

I am playing this game for a week or 2 and the idea of renaming kerbalnauts to your own/ppl you hate their name(s). I am not a programmer, but it should be possible right? I mean, there is a list or a generator of some sort which creates those names which are already in the game. So a way to change/add names would imo be awsome.

by the way I have actually NO IDEA if there is already something like I described above, but I googled it and searched on the forums as well. If there is, please post a link in your reply or desribe in which folder it can be found.

thx in advance

Hi Delta, just open your persistence.sfs file in notepad and change the names to your hearts content

Oh and welcome to the community
thx for your quick reaction and giving the solution and most important thx for the warm welcome into the community!

Hi Delta, just open your persistence.sfs file in notepad and change the names to your hearts content

Oh and welcome to the community

This is definitely how you go about changing those files. I would like to add on some additional information to it you may find useful.

Inside the same persistence.sfs you can change the "TOD" to 0 to "revive" dead Kerbonauts.

If your having trouble finding the folder follow this simple directory aid. Under your KSP folder click ( Saves\Default\persistence.sfs )

-Note: "This is for windows as i do not own a mac i am unsure if the directory is the same or not."
